ing: 10 marinated pitted Kalamata olives, finely chopped
2 tablespoons olive marinade from the jar
des: "Easy aioli is the perfect complement to a weekday fish. Goes great with crab cakes, fish sticks, and french fries! From casual to company, no one will know how easy it was."
ins: Mix mayonnaise and Kalamata olives together in a bowl. Thin mixture with olive marinade to desired consistency.
